00036 #ifndef ADS7828_H
00037 #define ADS7828_H
00038 
00039 #include "global.h"
00040 
00041 // constants/macros/typdefs
00042 #define ADS7828_I2C_ADDR        0x90    
00043 
00044 // command register bit defines
00045 #define ADS7828_CMD_PD0         0x04    
00046 #define ADS7828_CMD_PD1         0x08    
00047 #define ADS7828_CMD_C0          0x10    
00048 #define ADS7828_CMD_C1          0x20    
00049 #define ADS7828_CMD_C2          0x40    
00050 #define ADS7828_CMD_SD          0x80    
00051 
00052 // single-ended channel order defines
00053 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH0         0x00    
00054 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH1         0x04    
00055 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH2         0x01    
00056 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH3         0x05    
00057 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH4         0x02    
00058 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH5         0x06    
00059 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH6         0x03    
00060 #define ADS7828_CMD_CH7         0x07    
00061 
00062 // power-down mode defines
00063 #define ADS7828_CMD_PDMODE0     0x00    
00064 #define ADS7828_CMD_PDMODE1     0x04    
00065 #define ADS7828_CMD_PDMODE2     0x08    
00066 #define ADS7828_CMD_PDMODE3     0x0C    
00067

00069

00075

00083 
00085 u16 ads7828ConvertDiff(u08 i2cAddr, u08 channel);
00086 
00088 u16 ads7828ConvertRaw(u08 i2cAddr, u08 channel);
